Creatures killed may drop some coin fragments.
item.richesfrombelow.deck_of_fates.toolt: Right click to draw a card
text.richesfrombelow.card.default: what the hell how did u even do this??????
text.richesfrombelow.card.devil: The Devil: May our contract serve you well.
text.richesfrombelow.card.king: The King: Your reign begins. The realm provides for its ruler.
text.richesfrombelow.card.moon: The Moon: The night is your guide.
text.richesfrombelow.card.sun: The Sun: Bask in the light of dawn.
text.richesfrombelow.card.tower: The Tower: What was built on hubris shall fall to ruin.
text.richesfrombelow.fortune.11: You are not hitting that 1% chance.
text.richesfrombelow.fortune.2: Seek help from professionals trained in mental health care.
text.richesfrombelow.fortune.3: Your finances will be a key to your financial future
text.richesfrombelow.fortune.4: Only listen to fortune cookie, disregard all other fortune telling.
text.richesfrombelow.fortune.8: Check the 2nd chest in your base.
text.richesfrombelow.fortune.9: Maybe the next cookie will give you a fortune...
text.richesfrombelow.fortune.treasure: a great fortune has revealed itself at %s, %s, %s!
text.richesfrombelow.wishing_star.failur: The star fizzles out, draining your experience...
text.richesfrombelow.wishing_star.succes: Your wish has been granted! You gain %s levels!
tooltip.richesfrombelow.all_in_item: Consumes ALL Kobo Coins in inventory.
